text: Aegires absalaoi is a species of sea slug, a nudibranch, a marine, opisthobranch gastropod mollusc in the family Aegiridae.Bouchet, P. (2010). Aegires absalaoi Garcia, Troncoso & Dominguez, 2002. In: MolluscaBase (2017). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species on 2017-04-24. ==Distribution== This species was described from Fernando de Noronha, Brazil. ==References== Category:Aegiridae Category:Gastropods described in 2002
title: Aegires absalaoi
